breakfast.location_base: Jiujiang Road 501, Room 106, Huangpu District (near Nanjing East Road Metro Station Exit 4, 100m walk)
breakfast.location_local: 黄浦区九江路501号106室（靠近南京东路地铁站4号口，步行100米）
breakfast.notes_local: 温馨精品咖啡店，靠近酒店。适合早晨喝咖啡、简单早餐后开始城市探索。位置方便。
breakfast.signature_dishes_base: Specialty pour-over coffee, avocado toast, croissant
breakfast.signature_dishes_local: 手冲精品咖啡, 牛油果吐司, 可颂
breakfast.notes_base: INFJ-FRIENDLY: Cozy specialty coffee shop near hotel. Perfect for morning coffee and light breakfast before city exploration. Convenient location for start of People's Square/Bund day. Verified via Gaode Maps POI ID: B0L6K9D71B.

lunch.location_base: No. 158-160 Anfu Road, Xuhui District, Shanghai
lunch.notes_local: 位于安福路购物街核心位置的休闲餐厅。评分4.7，人均¥127。营业时间：周一至周日08:00-24:00。适合上午逛街后的午餐。提供西式简餐和轻食选择。距离上午购物路线步行可达。
lunch.signature_dishes_local: 意面, 三明治, 沙拉, 早午餐
lunch.notes_base: CASUAL LUNCH SPOT: Located in heart of Anfu Road shopping area. Rating: 4.7/5.0. Cost: ¥127 per person. Operating hours: Mon-Sun 08:00-24:00. Perfect for lunch after morning shopping at Duozhuayu, Wiggle Wiggle, and other Anfu Road boutiques. Western casual dining with light meal options. Walking distance from morning shopping route. Verified via Gaode Maps POI ID: B0FFLFBYMG. Note: RedNote verification attempted but unavailable due to environment constraints.

dinner.name_local: 人和馆 - 肇嘉浜路店
dinner.location_base: Zaojiabang Road 407, Xuhui District (230m walk from Jiashan Road Metro Station Exit 5)
dinner.location_local: 徐汇区肇嘉浜路407号（距嘉善路地铁站5号口步行230米）
dinner.signature_dishes_base: Braised pork belly Shanghai-style, smoked fish, crystal shrimp
dinner.signature_dishes_local: 上海红烧肉, 熏鱼, 水晶虾仁
dinner.notes_base: MICHELIN-RECOMMENDED: Authentic Shanghai local cuisine (本帮菜). Rating: 4.8/5.0. Cost: ¥186 per person. Operating hours: Mon-Fri 11:00-14:00, 17:00-21:30; Sat-Sun 11:00-14:00, 16:30-21:30. DINNER TIME: 19:30 (7:30pm) as requested by user. Famous for classic Shanghai dishes. Business area: Fenglin Road (枫林路). Verified via Gaode Maps POI ID: B0FFF407ML. Also available: Jing'an Temple Branch (静安寺店) at Yuyuan Road 142 if preferred.
